A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: You have to see this movie twice before you can fully appreciate how amazing it is. Much better than Ep. 7\, which was really just a rehash of Ep. 1 and Ep. 4. It defies expectations (which is probably why some people don’t like it). I am a lifelong Star Wars fan (since 1977) and I love this addition to the franchise!
